item.title: Consumer reviews and personal recommendations are as important as trusted brand reviews for Internet consumers
item.description: We’ve seen it growing year by year but the latest Nielsen research really drives it home. There is a great piece about it over on Computerworld. Consumer reviews and personal recommendations are as important as trusted brand reviews for Internet consumers. The Nielsen survey, the largest of its kind, shows that 90 percent of Internet consumers worldwide trust recommendations from people they know, while 70 percent trust consumer opinions posted online.
